description: MCP server lists all recipe resources
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/list
Verify response includes recipe resources
Verify each recipe has title, description, and mimeType
Verify resource URIs follow format recipe://fullstackrecipes.com/<slug>

description: MCP server lists all cookbook resources
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/list
Verify response includes cookbook resources
Verify each cookbook has title, description, and mimeType
Verify resource URIs follow format cookbook://fullstackrecipes.com/<slug>

description: Recipe resource includes markdown content with frontmatter
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/read for a recipe URI
Verify response includes markdown content
Verify frontmatter includes title as h1 heading
Verify frontmatter includes description
Verify frontmatter includes tags
Verify content separator (---) appears before main content

description: Recipe resource includes prerequisites when defined
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/read for a recipe with prerequisites (e.g., neon-drizzle-setup)
Verify frontmatter includes prerequisites section
Verify prerequisites section lists required recipe titles
Verify prerequisites section includes instruction to fulfill them first

description: Recipe resource omits prerequisites when none defined
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/read for a recipe without prerequisites (e.g., nextjs-on-vercel)
Verify frontmatter does not include prerequisites section
Verify content flows directly from tags to separator

description: Cookbook resource includes included recipes list
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/read for a cookbook URI
Verify frontmatter includes Included Recipes section
Verify each included recipe is listed by title
Verify recipes are listed in cookbook order

description: Cookbook resource includes prerequisites when defined
steps: Connect to MCP server at /api/mcp
Request resources/read for a cookbook with prerequisites (e.g., authentication)
Verify frontmatter includes prerequisites section
Verify prerequisites appear before Included Recipes section
